nodes.name: La Bohème

meta.metadescription: In tribute to the famed opera by the same name, we give you 'La Bohème', a collection of clothing we find most airy, rebellious, and artistic. Clean lines and breathable fabrics make this a versatile collection⁠—with clothing that feels as at home on the beach on vacation as it does in your neighborhood park during a summer dog walk.

itemsFirstPage.title: In the Navy Now Maxi Jumpsuit
itemsFirstPage.desc: Custom made navy jumpsuit with red wood necklace and bracelet
